meanings.definition: To remove or delete a program or software from a computer or device.
meanings.sent1: I need to uninstal this app to free up space on my phone.
meanings.sent2: Remember to uninstal any unnecessary programs to keep your computer running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: Trying to uninstal a stubborn software can be quite frustrating.
meanings.sent4: She decided to uninstal the toxic relationship from her life.
meanings.sent5: The magician waved his wand, and the program uninstaled itself from the screen.

meanings.definition: The act of uninstalling a program or software.
meanings.sent1: After the uninstal, my computer started working faster.
meanings.sent2: I performed the uninstal of the outdated software without any issues.
meanings.sent3: The uninstal of the game left him with mixed feelings of relief and nostalgia.
meanings.sent4: The uninstal of the app was like saying goodbye to an old friend.
meanings.sent5: The uninstal process was quick and efficient, thanks to the new software update.
